message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its quality and features, I'm asking for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price that reflects its true value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price for a product of this quality, considering my budget constraints.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $9,500 is significantly below its value. I'm willing to come down a bit to $12,500.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your flexibility, but $12,500 is still out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.
